> This _is_ and open source project, so don't hesitate to submit 
patches if you fix something. And just for clarification: the 0.1 
release isn't the latest. In fact, it is very ancient. Click on the 
CVS link to get to the latest.

Cool.

You guys will be adding documentation to make it easier to find parts 
of the code you are looking for, right?  Like identifying which module 
sets the damage by weapons?
